main event: A bright white self-luminous object was observed changing to an orange color in Thibodaux, Louisiana, from October 15-20, 1967.
interesting points: The observer noted that the phenomenon had an erratic motion pattern, changing direction and speed during the observation period,The sighting lasted between 30 to 90 seconds and the object was seen at night,The object emitted a glow that changed colors,The observer mentioned a previous skepticism regarding UFOs but became intrigued after discussing it with others,There were reports of a similar light phenomenon occurring in the vicinity shortly before this sighting.
witness description: A male individual involved in agricultural work
